name: A Man's Home
description: This game is a sort of resource gathering turn-based tower defense game made in the SRPG studio engine for the "Don't Make Fire Emblem" game jam. The game uses no added coding or scripts of any kind, just features built-in to the SRPG studio engine. The aim of this project is to show how, even without coding, you can make a fun and unique game in the engine without having to make a FE clone.
